title: Bugsplat
body:
Well,today i lost a ranked game (was remaked) because a Bugsplat appeared,so i could not play,well the day could start better,but well what could i do?
Next game...same thing happens and here comes my question,i started before that a custom game to be SURE nothing could be missing this time,but nop still get a bug splat...how can it be that the "Repair" didn't repair the missing files i don't get it,i have no similar problems with other games.

replies.body: Ok,don't know why but the bugsplat has stopped to appear...is it possible that i don't wait 20 min now...?
Wohoooo leave booster for something i can't do anything wohooooo
Happen again,woho back to silver II :3

It's really important to resolve whatever is causing you to bugsplat to prevent further penalties from happening.  If repair isn't resolving this then there may be other hardware or driver issues that could be causing this.  I recommend going over every step in our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to get this fixed.  You can also download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to automatically perform some of the steps found there.  Hope that helps!
